Hi Dominick I responded to your message on my demo page. in-case you missed it: Hi here’s what I recommend if you’re using a coded template.

Create a drag n drop template, drop the module in, use the edit pane to set the modules settings to what you want. Then right click the drag n drop template, and there is a show source code option, use that to grab the code you need for your menu, paste that into your coded template
Disabling the cache is definitely not recommended. That said, using the random filter should automatically disable caching on a page. If you have an example page, we can take a look.
